tool.name: LandAccounts

param.name: Output_folder
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and folder name where output from this tool should be stored.

param.name: Land_extent_option
param.expression: One shapefile with multiple fields | Two separate shapefiles
param.dialogReference:
Two land cover options are available:

  • One shapefile with multiple files: The user can enter one shapefile with two fields specifying land cover from two different timeframes (e.g. 2000 and 2015).

  • Two separate shapefiles: The user can enter two shapefiles with one land cover field each.

param.name: Input_land_cover
param.displayname: Land cover or other land extent dataset: one file with multiple fields
param.dialogReference: If the option One shapefile with multiple fields is selected above, specify the path and filename of the input land cover dataset here.

param.name: Opening_land_cover
param.displayname: Land cover or other land extent dataset: opening cover shapefile
param.dialogReference: If the option Two separate shapefiles is selected above, specify the path and filename of the opening land cover dataset here.

param.name: Closing_land_cover
param.displayname: Land cover or other land extent dataset: closing cover shapefile
param.dialogReference: If the option Two separate shapefiles is selected above, specify the path and filename of the closing land cover dataset here.

param.name: Opening_field
param.dialogReference: Specify the field within the land cover dataset which contains information for opening land cover.

param.name: Closing_field
param.dialogReference: Specify the field within the land cover dataset which contains information for closing land cover.

param.name: Land_cover_table
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the table that contains information on the land cover classification code and any other information (e.g. labels) that will be associated with the final output.

param.name: Land_cover_field
param.dialogReference: Specify the field within the land cover dataset which contains information for closing land cover.

tool.summary:
This tool calculates the land cover extent (square kilometres), absolute change in area, and relative difference in area between land cover extents of two different years. The land cover classification must use unique identifiers/codes that are the same between the opening and closing land cover timeframes. For example, "10" in the opening land cover may correspond to "agriculture." In the closing land cover, the same code and land cover pairing must be used.

The outputs produced are a map of the opening land cover showing the areas where there was a negative, positive, or no change in land cover extent, and a csv file summarising the land cover extents, absolute changes, and relative changes.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
This tool calculates the land cover extent (square kilometres), absolute change in area, and relative difference in area between land cover extents of two different years. The land cover classification must use unique identifiers/codes that are the same between the opening and closing land cover timeframes. For example, "10" in the opening land cover may correspond to "agriculture." In the closing land cover, the same code and land cover pairing must be used.

The outputs produced are a map of the opening land cover showing the areas where there was a negative, positive, or no change in land cover extent, and a csv file summarising the land cover extents, absolute changes, and relative changes.
